General.Name: Vietnam Electric Cable Corp
General.Description: Vietnam Electric Cable Corporation produces, sells, and exports various electric wires and cables in Vietnam and internationally. The company offers building wires, medium voltage, control, service entrance, multiplex, specialized, LAN, automotive, coaxial, and low and medium voltage aerial bundled cables, as well as flame retardant, fire resistant, low smoke free halogen, and low voltage power cables. It also provides bare and low voltage power cables-sector conductors; enamelled wires; paper covered rectangular copper wires; and electric devices and accessories. Vietnam Electric Cable Corporation was found in 1975 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Vietnam Electric Cable Corporation operates as a subsidiary of GELEX Electric Equipment Co. JSC.
